name: blandness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of not having a strong taste or character or not showing any interest or energy: He made a joke about the blandness of the food. The characters are familiar to the point of blandness. See
bland
More examplesFewer examplesThe office is a model of blandness.Hospital food, once mocked for its blandness, has gone upscale.My usual enthusiasm for life was replaced by blandness.
